a matrix is not an img, si it would not fit. Maybe a new module dedicated to connectome plotting ? There would be some other valuable viz to add in there, like the circle viz made by Elvis.

This issue is talking about a connectivity matrix plotting function. Ie, a connectome. Another way to visualize it is with the circle diagrame like this:

![connectome](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1647301/17324459/e4002104-58a6-11e6-92ce-c12f7d87b84d.jpg)

Given that both are representation of a connectome, I think that we can put them altogether.

What other matrices do we have to plot? Given the focus of nilearn, we should target the usage of the plotting functions.

Also, the description states:

> Can we add a function for plotting **a connectivity matrix** with the regions labels

I am not against having a general matrix plotting function. I am just wondering if it is useful.
